revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=LaCie |model=5Big |revision=Network (REV:3.0) |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=03/2008 |type=NAS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=6.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F5281 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL032A90TFIR2 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5PS121621CFP-Y5 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=SATA II, eSATA, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sata_num=8 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1118 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=I2C Bus Serial RTC;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1;,,, 8-Channel SATA II Controller;Marvell;88SX6081;;1;,,, 4K 2-Wire Serial EEPROM;Aplus Flash Tech;AF24BC04;;1;,,, Fan Speed PWM Controller;Global Mixed-mode Tech;G760A;;1;,,, In-System Programmable High Density PLD;Lattice Semi;LC4128V;;1;,,, 5V/12V Synchronous Buck PWM DC/DC Controller;Richtek;RT9214;;1;,,, 30V, 8.8A P-Channel PowerTrench MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS4435BZ;;1;,,, 30V, 11.6A N-Channel PowerTrench MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS8880;;2;,,, 2.7-5.5V Current Limit Step Down Regulator;Marvell;88PG847B;;2;,,, 12-bit to 24-bit Multiplexed D-Type Latch;TI;ALVCH162260;;1;,,, 3A Peak Current Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;MVPG31;;3;,,, 4MHz PWM Buck Regulator;Micrel;MIC23051;;2; |flags=eSATA, RTC w/ battery, power switch, fan, metal case |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 2.4.9; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.22.7;Marvell LSP 3.0.5; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:D0:4B }} {{TagLine|LaCie 5Big Network}} :[https://www.lacie.com/support/network-storage/5big-network/ Support page]
"5BIG_NAS_MB REV:3.0" and "2008.02.28" are silkscreened on the board.
{{See also|LaCie 5Big Network 2|LaCie}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F5281 @500MHz :SoC: ''Feroceon'' (ARMv5) *Storage: 4MB (NOR) Flash, :5x SATA, 3x eSATA ports *Memory: 128MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Network: 1x GbE port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 port *Power Source: 12V/6.6A via barrel
===Links=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/lacie-5big-network-reviewed/ ''LaCie 5big Network Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://www.itpro.com/610665/lacie-5big-network-review ''LaCie 5big Network review'' on '''ITPro''']
